scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:less
scripts.build:web: rollup web/index.js --context window --file dist/js/controller.min.js --format iife --sourcemap && rollup web/vendor.js --context window --file dist/js/composant.min.js --format iife --sourcemap
scripts.build:less: lessc --source-map web/theme.less dist/css/theme.min.css && lessc --source-map web/jdroll.angular.less dist/css/jdroll.angular.min.css
scripts.composer: docker-compose exec php composer install && docker-compose exec php composer dump-autoload -o
